Freelance senior product designer with 8.5 years of experience. Based in Copenhagen. Available for remote-friendly freelance work from July.Most recently at Denmark’s newest unicorn, Pleo. Previously, at Monzo — the fastest growing bank in the UK. Before that, the first design hire at Thriva.
